alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 21 at 2:53PM EST until December 24 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...Northern Worcester MA, Southern Worcester MA and Northern Middlesex MA Counties. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southern Worcester
